rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0001
rows.name:
Did Boss know? They recruiting
over there for new Drivers.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0002
rows.name:
Yeah, I saw that earlier when we
first arrived in the city.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0003
rows.name:
Boss should try too!
Chance of success basically 100%!

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm wanted by the Superbian Empire
right now, remember? It seems like a
bad idea to make myself conspicuous...

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0005
rows.name: Boss make good point...

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0006
rows.name:
Tora was just too curious to see
what kind of Blade Boss awaken...

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0007
rows.name:
At any rate, I don't need to awaken
a Blade, do I? I've already got Homura.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0008
rows.name:
Come now, Rex. Don't tell me you
thought Drivers could only bond with
a single Blade!

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0009
rows.name: What? Is that not right?

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0010
rows.name:
Not at all. Many Drivers have
more than one.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0011
rows.name:
With Nia gone, we're a bit short on
numbers right now. We might not hold
up all that well in a fight...

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0012
rows.name:
Perhaps it would actually be a good
idea to get yourself a new Blade.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0013
rows.name:
A new Blade opens up new possibilities
in battle, after all.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0014
rows.name: Hmmmm...

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0015
rows.name:
It would stop you from putting so much
strain on Homura, as well. Seems like a
good thing all round, if you ask me.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0016
rows.name:
Well, if Homura doesn't mind, I guess
it couldn't hurt to try.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0017
rows.name:
I don't have any objections.
The more the merrier!

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0018
rows.name: Then it settled!

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0019
rows.name:
The question is, where are we going
to get ourselves a Core Crystal?

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0020
rows.name: Now that's one question I can answer!

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0021
rows.name:
I happen to have one stored away
for just such an occasion.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0022
rows.name:
Where Gramps hide Core Crystal
with such small body...?

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0023
rows.name:
The key to awakening a new Blade
is to foster a powerful resonance with
the Driver's spirit.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0024
rows.name:
Focus your whole mind on the
Core Crystal as you touch it.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0025
rows.name:
And try to hold a clear picture in
your mind of the Blade you wish
to awaken.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0026
rows.name:
I'm not sure I really understand,
but I'll give it a try.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0027
rows.name: I hope you awaken a wonderful Blade!
